name: Fairfield Inn by Marriott Huntsville

reviews.text: The Fairfield is a good choice in Huntsville. It's quiet, clean, and well located. There's plenty of restaurants nearby - check out the Dreamland BBQ a couple of miles down University. There's also several
reviews.title: Good, basic hotel

reviews.text: shopping centers and a mall near the hotel. The beds are fantastic. I'm not sure if they're memory foam, but it sure feels like it.
reviews.title: Thanksgiving trip

likes.liked: — The pool, hottub, and great price

aka: Fairfield Inn By Marriott Huntsville Hotel
description: The Huntsville Fairfield Inn is located in the beautiful Cummings Research Park area, just off of Hwy. 72 and within minutes of I-65 and I-565 in the largest city of northern Alabama. For fun and entertainment, the US Space and Rocket Center, Redstone Arsenal, Marshall Spaceflight Center, and Huntsville Botanical Gardens are just a short drive away.
